text: LS-1727 (also known as nandrolone 17β-N-(2-chloroethyl)-N-nitrosocarbamate) is a synthetic, injected anabolic–androgenic steroid (AAS) and a nitrosocarbamate ester of nandrolone (19-nortestosterone) which was developed as a cytostatic antineoplastic agent but was never marketed. ==See also== * List of hormonal cytostatic antineoplastic agents * List of androgen esters § Nandrolone esters ==References== Category:Abandoned drugs Category:Androgens and anabolic steroids Category:Antineoplastic drugs Category:Estranes Category:Hormonal antineoplastic drugs Category:Nandrolone esters Category:Nitrogen mustards Category:Organochlorides Category:Prodrugs Category:Progestogens Category:Chloroethyl compounds Category:Nitrosocarbamates
title: LS-1727
